Subject: Halucigen returns....

From: gunthers@...

Halucigen sees Alliance Island up ahead of him.  In his vulture 
mode he flies up abovie it circling it, looking for a breach in the 
shields and a way onto the island to meet the leader. After finding 
nothing he opens a comm to anyone on the island.  "This is 
Halucigen, a rouge member of the Destrons.  After being left for 
dead by them I have decided to join another faction, with hopes of 
revenge to slowly kill the Destrons off, one bye one."
